price: 21. Ou alors ont-ils adopté des divinités à partir de la terre qui, celles-là, vont ressusciter les morts ?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
